question: Guess the song: "So it's gonna be forever / Or it's gonna go down in flames / You can tell me when it's over / If the high was worth the pain."

Guess the song: "One taught me love / One taught me patience / And one taught me pain / Now, I'm so amazing."
Guess the song: "When you leave, I'm begging you not to go / Call your name two, three times in a row."
ans: Call Me Maybe - Carly Rae Jepsen

question: Fill in the blanks: "Mamma mia, ___ ___ ___ again / My, my, how can I resist you?" (Mamma Mia - Abba)
